Description

Alexander Van den Bulck is an indie solo developer located in Belgium. His current project is a Tower Defense Deckbuilder called Shapebreaker.

History

Alexander is a big fan of both the Tower Defense genre and Roguelike Deckbuilders. The idea of combining these two genres led to the development of Shapebreaker which started in November 2021. Early prototypes of the game were very well received. This led to the game quickly moving to Itch.io, resulting in a first wave of fans and players. Alexander strongly believes that early feedback from players is essential to making a game the best it can be. An active Discord server and in-game feedback feature have proven invaluable during further development of the game. In order to gather even more feedback, it was released in Early Access on July 19, 2021. After having spend 10 months in Early Access the game is now ready to exit Early Access on May 2, 2023
